price: E com efeito, fizemos descer para ti versículos evidentes; e não os renegam senão os perversos.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖۖ وَمَا يَكۡفُرُ بِهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walaqad anzalnā ilayka āyātin bayyinātin wamā yakfuru bihā illā al-fāsiqūna
